languages.text: "Захватите разрывные пули из арсенала. С оторванными ногами он не убежит далеко".
languages.translation_comment: Старший офицер, стоящий рядом с когитаторами

languages.text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."
languages.original_text: "Захватите разрывные пули из арсенала. С оторванными ногами он не убежит далеко".

traits.locale_text: "Grab expanding bullets from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."
"Grab expanding bullets from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."
"Grab some expanding bullets from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."
"Grab some expanding bullets from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."
"Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."
"Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

languages.text: "Holt Euch etwas Sprengmunition aus dem Arsenal. Ohne Beine wird er nicht weit kommen."
languages.original_text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

traits.locale_text: "Holt Euch etwas Sprengmunition aus dem Arsenal. Ohne Beine wird er nicht weit kommen."

languages.text: « Prenez des munitions explosives dans l'arsenal. Un tir dans les jambes nous évitera d'avoir à lui courir après. »
languages.original_text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez des munitions explosives dans l'arsenal. Un tir dans les jambes nous évitera d'avoir à lui courir après. »

languages.text: “从军备库里拿点高爆弹出来。到时候他两条腿都炸没了，就别再想跑了。”
languages.original_text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

traits.locale_text: “从军备库里拿点高爆弹出来。到时候他两条腿都炸没了，就别再想跑了。”
“从军备库里拿点高爆弹出来。到时候他两条腿都炸没了，就别再想跑了。”

languages.text: «Coge unas balas explosivas de la armería. No llegará muy lejos sin piernas».
languages.original_text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

traits.locale_text: «Coge unas balas explosivas de la armería. No llegará muy lejos sin piernas».

languages.text: 「武器庫から爆発弾をいくつか取ってこい。足を吹き飛ばしてしまえば、奴は遠くに逃げられない」
languages.original_text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

traits.locale_text: 「武器庫から爆発弾をいくつか取ってこい。足を吹き飛ばしてしまえば、奴は遠くに逃げられない」

languages.text: "Cephanelikten patlayıcı mühimmat al. Bacaklarını koparırsak fazla uzağa kaçamaz."
languages.original_text: "Grab some explosive rounds from the armoury. He won't get far with his legs blown off."

traits.locale_text: "Cephanelikten patlayıcı mühimmat al. Bacaklarını koparırsak fazla uzağa kaçamaz."
